intro2.title02: No installation required - Data backups made simple

desc3.title03: Place the underline script in the backup folder
desc3.description03:
Download the latest _.cmd script
Place it on a USB stick (or elsewhere)
Learn to make your data redundant!

desc4.title04: Link the backup folder to the data
desc4.description04:
Locate the data you want to backup
& create shortcuts to these locations
(alongside the underline script)

desc5.title05: Execute the underline script to backup data
desc5.description05:
Execute the _.cmd script to backup data

... or automate it through planified tasks
